    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_89410</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Testing for the presence of sugar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfung auf das Vorhandensein des Zuckers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminer la présence du sucre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Testar para a presença do açúcar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esaminando a presenza di zucchero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκιμή για την παρουσία ζάχαρης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prueba para la presencia del azúcar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second in a series of three experiments used to test presence of substances in foods. This experiment tests for the presence of sugar in the food using Benedict's solution.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Benedict's solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbohydrates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">foods</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sugar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Testing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle in einer Reihe von drei 
Experimenten verwendete, Vorhandensein der Substanzen in den 
Nahrungsmitteln zu prüfen. Dieses Experiment prüft auf das 
Vorhandensein des Zuckers in der Nahrung mit Lösung Benedicts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu dans une série de trois 
expériences testaient la présence des substances en nourritures. 
Cette expérience détermine la présence du sucre dans la 
nourriture en utilisant la solution de Benedict.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo em uma série de três experiências 
usou-se testar a presença das substâncias nos alimentos. Esta 
experiência testa para a presença do açúcar no alimento usando a 
solução de Benedict.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo in una serie di tre esperimenti 
ha usato verificare la presenza delle sostanze in alimenti. 
Questo esperimento esamina a presenza dello zucchero 
nell'alimento usando la soluzione del Benedict.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερος τριών πειραμάτων που χρησιμοποιούνται σε μία
σειρά για να εξετάσουν την παρουσία ουσιών στα τρόφιμα. 
Αυτό το πείραμα εξετάζει για την παρουσία ζάχαρης στα 
τρόφιμα χρησιμοποιώντας τη λύση του Benedict.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar en una serie de tres 
experimentos probaban la presencia de sustancias en alimentos. 
Este experimento prueba para la presencia del azúcar en el 
alimento usando la solución de Benedict.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösung Benedicts</string>
          </keyword>
